EmailTemplate.subject: TriTech.com IQ - Links to Demo Recording and Brochure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTEDÂ <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> Discover the Power of TriTech.com IQ Link to April 11th Webinar Recording
{{lead.First Name:default=Client}} - Sorry we missed you! We wanted to share the link to the April 11th webinar recording with you about TriTech.com IQ, which includes information about the following:
- The power of the Public Safety Search Engine and real-time notifications - The intelligence from centralized reporting and analytics - The cost benefits of operating on a cloud-based platform - The security of Nlets hosting services
For information about TriTech.com IQ please contact your Client Account Manager or email sales@tritech.com. <mailto:sales@tritech.com> LINKS:
PRESENTER: Wendy Gilbert, Director of Product Management, and Charlie Barry, Senior Product Manager
RECORDING DATE: Thursday, April 11, 2013
TRITECH.COM IQ BROCHURE: Click to Download <http://www.tritech.com/resources/TriTecDotCom_IQ_Brochure.pdf>
LINK TO RECORDING <recordings.tritech.co/TriTechcom_IQ_Demonstration_April11-2013.wmv>
